overview: Two best friends are about to have their last intoxicating snowboarding adventure before they part company forever. Snowboarding action sequences shot in Mammoth highlight this fast paced, edgy, raucous teenage movie underscored by a pulsating sound track.
tagline: Two best friends are about to have their last intoxicating snowboarding adventure before they part company forever. Snowboarding action sequences shot in Mammoth highlight this fast paced, edgy, raucous teenage movie underscored by a pulsating sound track.
title: Last Ride
